actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy, Climate and Grid Security

official_title: Recognizing linemen, the profession of linemen, the contributions of these brave men and women who protect public safety, and expressing support for the designation of April 18, 2022, as National Lineman Appreciation Day.

summary.text:
This resolution recognizes the efforts of linemen in keeping the electrical power on and protecting public safety.

 This resolution also expresses support for the designation of National Lineman Appreciation Day and recognizes linemen as first responders.

titles.title: Recognizing linemen, the profession of linemen, the contributions of these brave men and women who protect public safety, and expressing support for the designation of April 18, 2022, as National Lineman Appreciation Day.
